channel.title: Mezzyscape No clip issue
channel.description:
Hello everyone! :D
How would I fix the mezzyscape no clip npc problem.. npc's seem to walking through everything and anything! Ive tried multiple solution but still no luck any tips or guides would be useful or a point in the right direction would be helpful as well.
Thanks James.

item.title: Mezzyscape No clip issue
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:2, topic:543370”]load the cache + maps and write the pathfinding algorithms, you’ll need a “smart” implementation (for players) and a “dumb” implementation (for npcs)

I personally ripped the cache and map stuff from hyperion, good luck[/quote]The dumb version is used for player following as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Mezzyscape No clip issue
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

load the cache + maps and write the pathfinding algorithms, you’ll need a “smart” implementation (for players) and a “dumb” implementation (for npcs)

I personally ripped the cache and map stuff from hyperion, good luck

Read full topic
